description: CoinWatch helps you convert the price of one coin into another. You can ask CoinWatch for the current market price of Bitcoin, or ask for it in a specific altcoin (also known as an alternative cryptocurrency)
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask coin watch what the price of Bitcoin is
What is the price of litecoin in bitcoin
What is the price of ethereum in bitcoin
name: CoinWatch
shortDescription: Get current prices of various cryptocurrencies
